title: PVP.NET connection issues
body:
Recently I bought a mobile broadband stick, as all other forms of internet are slow in my area and cause immense lag while gaming, and I have kept on disconnecting from "pvp.net" at infrequent intervals while the LOL client is running. Once in game it runs smoothly with high fps and minimal lag. This issue didn't appear when i went to my parents house for the weekend, and I have a friend in the same area as me who uses the same type of mobile broadband that I do and he doesn't get the error at all. It's starting to negatively affect my gameplay with temporary bans because of constant quitting / disconnecting.  
Does anyone know how to fix this?

replies.body:
Firstly, I'd hold tight a bit, because the servers aren't running at their best atm.

Secondly, what ISP is that mobile broadband stick for?
Have you tried using it in a different location? ie. if you go to your friend's house and use it on his computer, does it still lag like hell?
